amendatorysection.catchline: Adjutant General; Emergency Management Act; administer.
amendatorysection.para: There is hereby created in the office of the Adjutant General the Nebraska Emergency Management Agency. The Adjutant General shall administer the Emergency Management Act.

crossreference.para: For provisions relating to the Adjutant General, see section 55-101 et seq.
Vital resource emergency, see sections 84-162 to 84-167.
